City Council

El Lago City Council meetings are held at 7 p.m. on the first and third Wednesday (if needed) of each month. City Council meetings take place at El Lago City Hall, 411 Tallowood Drive, El Lago, TX 77586.

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval. Please visit the Agendas & Minutes page to access these documents.

Shawn Findley

Mayor

See Mayor History⇒
